session_summary: Homepage rebuilt to a personal trading journal (daily plan, journal vs articles, rules/risk, performance snapshot). Trading dark aesthetic applied to style.css. Deployment still pending because pysftp missing on host; SFTP push not executed.

homepage_redesign.description: home.php rebuilt as personal trading journal: Today’s Plan, Journal vs Articles split, Performance snapshot, Rules/Risk framework, journal-specific CTAs.

styling_dark_trading.description: style.css updated with trading palette (dark navy, trading green), dashboard cards, responsive tweaks for new sections.

theme_deployment_freeride.issue: pysftp not installed on host; deployment script fails before connect
theme_deployment_freeride.action: Install pysftp (pip install pysftp) then rerun tools/deploy_freeride_corrected.py to push updated theme files.

progress_metrics.homepage_state: Personal journal identity implemented (Today’s Plan, Journal vs Articles, Rules/Risk, Performance snapshot)
progress_metrics.deployment: Pending - pysftp missing, no SFTP push yet

high: Install pysftp and rerun tools/deploy_freeride_corrected.py to push the updated theme
Verify live site shows personal trading journal layout (Today’s Plan, Journal vs Articles, Rules/Risk, Performance snapshot)
medium: Add dynamic data sources for Today’s Plan and rules (ACF or custom fields)
Refine journal vs articles taxonomy (journal category/tag) for cleaner splits

notes: Homepage now aligns with personal trading journal identity; live verification still pending due to deployment block.
lessons_learned: Theme deployment scripts need runtime deps (pysftp) verified before execution
Clear personal signals (Today’s Plan, rules, performance snapshot) quickly shift perception from blog to journal
